detectors.description:
SBFTweetsRebase.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBFTweetsRebase.sol#177-187) can write the state variable array at will

	- _gonBalances[to] = _gonBalances[to].add(gonValue) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBFTweetsRebase.sol#184)

detectors.description:
SBFTweetsRebase.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBFTweetsRebase.sol#197-210) can write the state variable array at will

	- _gonBalances[to] = _gonBalances[to].add(gonValue) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBFTweetsRebase.sol#206)

detectors.description:
owner() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.owner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBFTweetsRebase.sol#74-76)

renounceOwnership() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.renounceOwnership() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBFTweetsRebase.sol#83-86)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBFTweetsRebase.sol#88-92)

totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- SBFTweetsRebase.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBFTweetsRebase.sol#161-167)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- SBFTweetsRebase.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBFTweetsRebase.sol#169-175)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SBFTweetsRebase.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBFTweetsRebase.sol#177-187)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- SBFTweetsRebase.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBFTweetsRebase.sol#189-195)

transferFrom(address,address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SBFTweetsRebase.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBFTweetsRebase.sol#197-210)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SBFTweetsRebase.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBFTweetsRebase.sol#212-219)

increaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SBFTweetsRebase.increaseAllowance(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBFTweetsRebase.sol#221-229)

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SBFTweetsRebase.decreaseAllowance(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBFTweetsRebase.sol#231-243)
private constant DECIMALS = 18; (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBFTweetsRebase.sol)#114
private constant MAX_UINT256 = ~uint256(0); (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBFTweetsRebase.sol)#115
private constant INITIAL_FRAGMENTS_SUPPLY = 100000 * 10**DECIMALS; (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBFTweetsRebase.sol)#116
private constant TOTAL_GONS = MAX_UINT256 - (MAX_UINT256 % INITIAL_FRAGMENTS_SUPPLY); (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBFTweetsRebase.sol)#118
private constant MAX_SUPPLY = ~uint128(0);  // (2^128) - 1 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBFTweetsRebase.sol)#120
private _totalSupply; (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBFTweetsRebase.sol)#122
